main.description: We are committed to creating inclusive web experiences for everyone.
main.aboutMe: Morpheus, my name is Diego Miranda. I am a Software Engineering student, specializing in information technology. I enjoy working on software projects and developing new technologies. Additionally, I am a creative and motivated person, always looking to learn and improve.
main.objective: My main goal in this work is to develop accessible and pleasant web solutions for people with disabilities. For this, I have researched and applied accessibility techniques, such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1.
main.examples: Here are some examples of projects I have done in the field of web accessibility:
